justification: “At Yale, IQ scores were determined using the Differential Ability Scales second edition (DAS-II).”

measured_by: Wechsler Abbreviated Scale of Intelligence–Second Edition (WASI-II)
justification: “At GW, IQ scores were determined using the Wechsler Abbreviated Scale of Intelligence-Second Edition (WASI-II).”
“Parents of a subset of participants across sites (N=43) filled out the SRS-2 … for their child, a measure of social skills.”
The paper explains that adolescents “played a simplified child-friendly version of the multi-round trust game” to examine “cooperation magnitude and strategies.”
